Part 3: Getting help and advice

You can email HM Revenue & Customs (HMRC) a VAT question online.

If you need more help with VAT, you can call:

VAT Helpline

Telephone:0845 010 9000
Textphone: 0845 000 0200

What to do if you suspect VAT fraud

If you suspect that a firm is avoiding paying VAT, or charging VAT when they aren’t VAT registered, you can report them anonymously to:

Customs Hotline

0800 595 000
